description: Southbound I-880 is closed in San Leandro at Lewelling Boulevard this morning due to an investigation into a shooting.
maintext:
**Sig Alert** SB 880 fully CLOSED at Lewelling Blvd due to a shooting on the freeway. No ETO. Update at 4:30am. pic.twitter.com/6bESataSHG â€” Alexis Smith (@AlexisABC7) August 14, 2017
Southbound I-880 is closed in San Leandro at Lewelling Boulevard this morning due to an investigation into a shooting.The lanes were closed at 2:44 a.m. and a Sig-alert was issued a few minutes later, CHP officials said.Officers said a person was shot in the head overnight.There is no estimate when lanes will reopen.
title: Shooting investigation closes southbound I-880 in San Leandro
